mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_role ( id, name, site_id, targets, is_supperuser, created_by, create_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date ) VALUES ( SEQ_GENERAL.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{site.id}, #{targets}, #{issupperuser}, #{createdBy.id}, sysdate, #{lastUpdatedBy.id}, sysdate )
mapper.update:
update admin_role set name=#{name},
targets=#{targets}, is_supperuser=#{issupperuser}, #{lastUpdatedBy.id}, sysdate where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.site_id as "site.id", r.targets, r.is_supperuser, r.created_by as "createdBy.id", r.create_date, r.last_updated_by as "lastUpdatedBy", r.last_update_date, s.name as "site.name", uc.username as "createdBy.username", uc.first_name as "createdBy.firstName", uc.last_name as "createdBy.lastName", ul.username as "lastUpdatedBy.username", ul.first_name as "lastUpdatedBy.firstName", ul.last_name as "lastUpdatedBy.lastName" from admin_role r left join site s on s.id = r.site_id left join sys_user uc on uc.id = r.created_by left join sys_user ul on ul.id = r.last_updated_by where r.id = #{id}

select r.id, r.name, r.site_id as "site.id", r.targets, r.is_supperuser, r.created_by as "createdBy.id", r.create_date, r.last_updated_by as "lastUpdatedBy", r.last_update_date, s.name as "site.name", uc.username as "createdBy.username", uc.first_name as "createdBy.firstName", uc.last_name as "createdBy.lastName", ul.username as "lastUpdatedBy.username", ul.first_name as "lastUpdatedBy.firstName", ul.last_name as "lastUpdatedBy.lastName" from admin_role r left join site s on s.id = r.site_id left join sys_user uc on uc.id = r.created_by left join sys_user ul on ul.id = r.last_updated_by
1=1
and r.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
